string.name: custom_label
string.description: Only used by the Sitrep Editor. Custom name of this element. If left empty, an auto generated name will be displayed.

string.name: type
string.description: XAML element type to generate (Ellipse, Rectangle, ...) Must match a style's TargetType from ui/HUD/Controls/SitrepResources.xaml.

string.name: style
string.description: XAML element style. Must match a style name from ui/HUD/Controls/SitrepResources.xaml.

file.name: image_path
file.description: Only used if the type is "Image".

template_reference.name: world_position
template_reference.description: 3D position, only the X and Z is used right now.

list.name: timeline
list.description: List of properties with their keyframes to animate this element.
